fields.name: Dimensions
fields.description: List of dimension conditions. For example: [{"DimensionName":"AppName","Operator":"Equals","Values":["App1"]},{"DimensionName":"Deployment","Operator":"Equals","Values":["default"]}].

fields.name: DividePerInstance
fields.description: a value indicating whether metric should divide per instance.

fields.name: MetricName
fields.description: the name of the metric that defines what the rule monitors.

fields.name: MetricNamespace
fields.description: the namespace of the metric that defines what the rule monitors.

fields.name: MetricResourceLocation
fields.description: the location of the resource the rule monitors.

fields.name: MetricResourceUri
fields.description: the resource identifier of the resource the rule monitors.

fields.name: Operator
fields.description: the operator that is used to compare the metric data and the threshold.

fields.name: Statistic
fields.description: the metric statistic type. How the metrics from multiple instances are combined.

fields.name: Threshold
fields.description: the threshold of the metric that triggers the scale action.

fields.name: TimeAggregation
fields.description: time aggregation type. How the data that is collected should be combined over time. The default value is Average.

fields.name: TimeGrain
fields.description: the granularity of metrics the rule monitors. Must be one of the predefined values returned from metric definitions for the metric. Must be between 12 hours and 1 minute.

fields.name: TimeWindow
fields.description: the range of time in which instance data is collected. This value must be greater than the delay in metric collection, which can vary from resource-to-resource. Must be between 12 hours and 5 minutes.
